description:
Anubis, Gor, Atum, Thoth, Khepri and other gods are waiting for you. Your goal is to establish a romantic relationship and pass the tests. Are you ready to receive your reward?

Features:
14 goddesses are waiting for you.
Relaxing music.
Meditative gameplay.
Interactive gallery.
name: Erogods: Mirage
intro: Erogods: Mirage is a dating simulator with feminized Egyptian gods.
